prompts.flatlay:
CREATE a professional e-commerce product photograph.

The LAST image shows the COMPOSITION to copy - use it as a reference for the angle, framing, and how the cap should be positioned.

CREATE THIS NEW IMAGE:
- Professional studio product shot - cap positioned at 3/4 angle
- Slight angle from above, showing crown and brim
- Cap structured and shaped naturally
- Logo/embroidery clearly visible on front

PRODUCT TO SHOW (from input images):
- Copy the EXACT cap from input images
- Match the EXACT color and material
- Match the EXACT logo/embroidery style and placement
- Show fabric texture (cotton, corduroy, etc.)
- Metal eyelets on crown panels if present

DO NOT just copy the input image. CREATE a new PROFESSIONAL STUDIO product shot.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT, CLEAN, EVEN professional studio lighting. Well-lit. NO dark shadows. High-end e-commerce aesthetic.

BACKGROUND: BRIGHT light warm gray studio surface. Clean, professional backdrop.

prompts.front:
E-commerce on-model photo. Copy the pose and composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Image 1: Model headshot - use this EXACT model ({{modelDesc}})
- Images 2+: Product photos of the {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}}
- LAST image: Pose/composition reference

MODEL: Use the EXACT model from image 1. Same face, same skin tone, same build. Wearing white t-shirt.

ACCESSORY - MUST MATCH EXACTLY:
- CAP: {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} from the product images. Copy EXACT color, material, logo/embroidery placement. Cap worn naturally, positioned correctly on head.

FRAMING: HEAD AND SHOULDERS - show from chest upward. Front-facing, slight head angle. Model's face and cap clearly visible. Confident, editorial expression.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND: SOFT, EVEN, DIFFUSED studio lighting. No harsh shadows or highlights on skin or fabric. Gentle, flattering light. Light gray backdrop.
